snippet: Mr. Cuomo, a spellbinding orator and colorful personality who flirted with running for the presidency, lived to see his son Andrew follow in his footsteps as governor.
abstract: Mario M Cuomo, former three-term New York governor, dies at age 82; Cuomo led state from 1983 through 1994 and while he struggled with State Legislature to enact agenda for activist government, he personified liberal wing of Democratic Party, whose leaders twice pressed him to no avail to run for president.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cuomo, a spellbinding orator and colorful personality who flirted with running for the presidency, lived to see his son Andrew follow in his footsteps as governor.

headline.main: Mario Cuomo, Ex-New York Governor and Liberal Beacon, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Mario Cuomo, 82, Dies; Three-Term Governor Was a Liberal Beacon
